PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-03942020-05-26,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Output-Based Pricing System Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the OUTPUT-BASED PRICING SYSTEM REGULATIONS in order to provide regulated parties with additional time to meet their regulatory requirements relating to the 2019 compliance period, given the constraints on business operations imposed by the COVID-19 measures.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0114 Publication Date: 2020-06-10
AttachmentsAttachment
